name: MIS Activity Attendance Analysis Report
description:
Is used to track scheduled Prisoners against actual attendances, cancellations, absences and unrecorded attendances.
ACT0031 v2 Last Modified: 17/07/2023

dataset.name: Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND, AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.END_TIME, ((AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.END_TIME - AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60 / 60 AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, 'No Slot') AS SLOT_AS_DIMENSION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.CODE, AT_DIM_SERVICE_CATEGORY.CODE AS ACTIVITY_SERVICE_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.CODE AS ACTIVITY_CODE, AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_DESC35, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_DIM_SERVICE_CATEGORY, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'PS_PA_OC') AND (AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE (+) = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_SERVICE_CATEGORY.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'PS_CATEGORY') AND (AT_DIM_SERVICE_CATEGORY.CODE = AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAM_CATEGORY) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, IEP_BAND, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, STATUS, START_TIME, END_TIME, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION, SLOT_AS_DIMENSION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ALLOCATED_FLAG, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, SURNAME, COMMENT_TEXT, CODE, ACTIVITY_SERVICE_CATEGORY_CODE, ACTIVITY_CODE, ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_DESC35, UNIT_1_CODE, INITCAP(ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION) AS V_ACTIVITY_DESC, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS V_SCHEDULED_PRISONERS, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS = 'ATT') AS V_ACTUAL_ATTENDED, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS = 'ACCAB') AS V_ACCEPTABLE_ABSENCE, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS = 'CANC') AS V_CANCELLED, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS = 'NREQ') AS V_NOT_REQUIRED, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS = 'UNACAB') AS V_UNACCEPT_ABSENCE, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS = 'UNBEH') AS V_UNACCEPT_BEHAVIOUR, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS = 'REST') AS V_REST_DAY, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS = 'COURT') AS V_COURT, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY STATUS IS NULL) AS V_NOT_RECORDED, COUNT(ACTIVITIES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS V_COUNT_NOMS, SENTENCED_ AS V_SENTENCED_, INITCAP(ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION) AS V_WORDCAP_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(V_CONCAT_NOMS_AND_SESSION) AS V_SUM_SCHEDULED, CASE WHEN ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_DESC35 IS NULL THEN 'Not Attended' ELSE 'Total Prisoners with' || ' ' || (ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_DESC35) || ' ' || 'status' END AS V_SUM_ATTENDANCE_DISPLAY, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_CASE_NOTE, 'TBD' AS V_MAX_CONCAT_IEP_CHANGE_DATE, 'TBD' AS V_MAX_CONCAT_IEP_HISTORIC_BAND FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Sentenced' WHEN FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH = '00/00/00' THEN 'Unsentenced' WHEN FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH IS NULL THEN 'Unsentenced' ELSE 'Sentenced' END AS SENTENCED_ FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.offender_booking_sk, BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM, BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_SENTENCE_STATUS dss WHERE (BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_STATUS_SK = dss.sentence_status_sk) AND dss.sentence_status = 'Active' AND (BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_SEQ_NK = BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.SENTENCE_SEQ_NK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE.COURT_CASE_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.COURT_CASE_SK) AND BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') DT_LIFEFLAG, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = DT_LIFEFLAG.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SENTENCED_ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: IEP
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, TRUNC(AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME) AS IEP_CHANGE_DATE_ONLY, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL, AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID_NK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_ID_NK) AND (AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TRUNC(AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME) BETWEEN TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, IEP_CHANGE_DATE_ONLY, IEP_LEVEL, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Case Notes
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_TIME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'TASK_SUBTYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT SAC.CASELOAD_ID FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC WHERE SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_))) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('25-09-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE IN ('ENTRY WARN', 'IEP_WARN'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CONTACT_TIME FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_SUM_ATTENDANCE_DISPLAY
field.legacySql: =If(IsNull([Activity Session Status Description]); "Not Attended";"Total Prisoners with" + " " + ([Activity Session Status Description]) + " " +"status")

report.name: IEP Warnings and IEP Changes in time frame

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_CASE_NOTE
field.display: No. of IEP Warning Case Notes in time frame

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_CONCAT_IEP_CHANGE_DATE
field.display: Date(s) of IEP Changes in time frame
field.legacySql: =[v_concat_IEP_Change_date] Where ([IEP Change Date Only]=[v_max_IEP_Change_date]) In ([NOMS Number])
